feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly built a working financial application that accepts natural-language scenarios, computes and compares investment projections, and produces recommendations and exports. Implementation evidence (JSON outputs, data integration, sanity checks) shows the tool performs financial tasks reliably, and reflective work indicates appropriate safeguards.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates multiple concrete AI integrations (NL parsing, OpenAI connectivity, structured outputs to prevent hallucination) and explains both technical (JSON, API) and ethical measures (guardrails). These specifics across Discover, Implement, and Reflect stages show AI adds clear functional value, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "for my project I built a um intelligent AI finance tool in replet."
"in version two I added structure JSON outputs which eliminated the hallucinated values."
"it divides my investment options into conservative, balanced and aggressive and shows the uh projected growth over time for all of them"
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: identified user need—"helps users understand financial decisions and not just calculate them"—showing conceptual framing.  
Implement: built the tool, added JSON outputs and external data integration/sanity checks to make financial outputs reliable.  
Reflect: added ethics and guardrails (no stock picking, risk disclosures) demonstrating responsible financial-app behavior.
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly built a working financial application that accepts natural-language scenarios, computes and compares investment projections, and produces recommendations and exports. Implementation evidence (JSON outputs, data integration, sanity checks) shows the tool performs financial tasks reliably, and reflective work indicates appropriate safeguards.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So what the tool does is that instead of asking users for numbers in the form, the tool accepts natural language."
"So this can understand semantic values as it's tied to, you know, open AI on key."
"in version two I added structure JSON outputs which eliminated the hallucinated values."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: identified user need and concept of natural-language input adding value.  
Implement: describes building the AI tool, connecting to OpenAI, and adding structured JSON outputs to reduce hallucination.  
Reflect: mentions ethics and guardrails (risk disclosures, no stock-picking) showing responsible AI integration.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates multiple concrete AI integrations (NL parsing, OpenAI connectivity, structured outputs to prevent hallucination) and explains both technical (JSON, API) and ethical measures (guardrails). These specifics across Discover, Implement, and Reflect stages show AI adds clear functional value, meeting the PASS standard.
